clinical_history: Patient with bone pain and prior cancer history.
findings: No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in adrenal gland with SUVmax 7.48.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
recommendations: Repeat PET-CT in 3–6 months to monitor treatment response.
